TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class OleDbCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自動產生單一資料表命令，可用來調解對 的變更和相關的資料庫。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調解所做的變更所需的 SQL 陳述式不會自動產生與相關聯的資料來源。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source. 不過，您可以建立物件來自動產生單一資料表更新的 SQL 陳述式，如果您設定屬性。However, you can create an object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然後，您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式由產生。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 自己註冊為接聽程式事件，每當您設定屬性。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 您只能將一個或彼此物件一次。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式使用屬性，以自動擷取一組必要中繼資料。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果您變更擷取的中繼資料，例如第一個更新之後，您應該呼叫之後方法來更新中繼資料。If you change the after the metadata is retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the method to update the metadata. 也會使用， ，以及屬性所參考。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 使用者應該呼叫修改一或多個屬性，則本身會被取代。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否則， ，和屬性會保留其先前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果您呼叫，則解除關聯，以及無法再使用產生的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用，以及和、 從資料來源選取資料列。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from a data source. 此範例會傳遞初始化，連接字串、 SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串和資料來源資料表名稱的字串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table. 這個範例會建立。The example then creates an . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自己註冊為接聽程式產生的事件這個屬性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 當您建立的新執行個體，任何現有與此相關聯發行。When you create a new instance , any existing associated with this is released.

summary.span: 取得或設定會自動產生 SQL 陳述式的 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets an object for which SQL statements are automatically generated.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自己註冊為接聽程式產生的事件這個屬性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 當您建立的新執行個體，任何現有與此相關聯發行。When you create a new instance , any existing associated with this is released.

param.name: command
param.span: ，參考參數資訊衍生來源的預存程序。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 衍生的參數已加入到 的 集合。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 從 中指定的預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 擷取參數資訊，並填入 (Populate) 指定 物件的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會覆寫任何現有參數資訊。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要額外的呼叫到資料來源取得的資訊。 requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information. 如果事先已知參數資訊，它會更有效率的方式藉由明確設定的資訊填入參數集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用預存程序。You can only use with stored procedures. 您無法使用填入使用任意的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，例如參數化的 SELECT 陳述式。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 基礎 OLE DB 提供者 (Provider) 不支援傳回預存程序參數資訊，命令文字不是有效的預存程序名稱，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The underlying OLE DB provider does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

summary.span: 取得在資料來源上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，會仍在使用來自前一個陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，會仍在使用來自前一個陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified.

summary.span: 在正確資料庫目錄情況下提供不具引號的識別項時，會傳回該識別項具引號的正確格式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 這包括正確地逸出識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
